properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
TEN METER S/V ZEN, WHITE AND GRAY HULL, ONE PERSON ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO RUDDER PROBLEMS IN 16-12N 048-49W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
TELEX: 42912008, PHONE: 5965 9670 9292, FAX: 5965 9663 2450.
